participant_1.background:
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I have three grown children and six grandchildren.
I love caring for people.
I love to ride my bike.
I have two dogs and one cat.

participant_2.background:
My favorite musician is john denver.
I also enjoy cooking meals with food from our garden.
I was raised on a large horse ranch.
I work out every day.
I love to work with horses.

content.text: I love riding my bike too! It's such a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I know right! I love going for long bike rides in the country. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I used to live in the country, but now I live in the city. I miss being able to go on long bike rides.
You should come visit me sometime! I'll take you on a bike ride through the country.
That would be awesome! I'd love to see the country.
Great! I'll start planning the trip.
I'm excited!
Me too!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love working out and cooking. I also like to read and listen to music.
I love to read too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like mysteries and thrillers.
I love mysteries and thrillers too! I've been reading a lot of Stephen King lately.
He's a great author! I've read a few of his books.
Yeah, he's one of my favorites.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to go on vacation.
I love to spend time with my family and friends too. I don't go on vacation very often, but I love it when I do.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! We should definitely get together sometime.
That would be great!
